name: Black Diamond MiniWire Rack Pack
description: Shave grams with 6 of the lightest of the light wire gates, designed for a pared-down alpine or long-route rack.Lightest fully-functional Black Diamond carabiner.Hot-Forged construction.Colour coded to match BD cams.Nose geometry allows for efficient clipping/unclipping.Small proportions may not suit climbers with meaty fingers wearing big gloves.
